text:
<https://www.uncorkedstudios.com/blog/nick-parish-editorial-director-values-and-the-future-of-design/|Magic Words: Editorial Values and the Future of Design>
I’m very excited to join Uncorked Studios’ Semiotics Practice as its editorial director.

After a career in publishing, I’m now working at a full-fledged product studio, which calls for a little reflection.

We writers view designers as strange cousins. We speak in similar terms but don’t always understand each other.

I remember watching Basecamp’s <https://twitter.com/jasonfried|Jason Fried>—a writer—give an audience of designers at SXSW some advice years ago:...

attachments.title: Magic Words: Editorial Values and the Future of Design
attachments.text: I’m very excited to join Uncorked Studios’ Semiotics Practice as its editorial director. After a career in publishing, I’m now working at a full-fledged product studio, which calls for a little reflection. We writers view designers as strange cousins. We speak in similar terms but don’t always understand each other. I remember watching Basecamp’s Jason Fried—a writer—give an audience of designers at SXSW some advice years ago: “Before you redesign, rewrite.

attachments.text: The latest Tweets from Jason Fried (@jasonfried). Founder & CEO at <https://t.co/berTbpcYeV>. Co-author of Getting Real, Remote, and NYT Bestseller REWORK. Also at <https://t.co/tx3Y2ahuqf>. Chicago, IL
